Package com.ochafik.util.listenable

Interface Summary
Adapter<U,V>  
CollectionListener<T> Post-modification collection event listener.
Filter<V>  
ListenableCollection<T> Interface for collections that support modification listeners.
ListenableList<T> Interface for lists that support modification listeners.
ListenableMap<K,V> Interface for maps which key set, entry set and values collection support modification listeners.
ListenableSet<T> Interface for sets that support modification listeners.
ListenableSortedSet<T> Interface for sorted sets that support modification listeners.
 

Class Summary
AdaptedCollection<U,V> ListenableCollection<V> that wraps a Collection<U>, using adapters from U to V (and optionally backwards, for support of the add(V) method).
AdaptedList<U,V> ListenableList<V> that wraps a List<U>, using adapters from U to V (and optionnally backwards, for support of the add(V) method).
CollectionEvent<T> Event that represents a modification of a listenable collection.
DefaultListenableCollection<T> Default implementation of the ListenableCollection interface.
DefaultListenableList<T> Default implementation of the ListenableList interface.
DefaultListenableMap<K,V> Default implementation of the ListenableMao interface.
FilteredListenableSet<T> Sub-view of a listenable set, which only contains elements of the original set that were accepted by a Filter.
ListenableCollections Utility methods to make the most out of listenable collections.
ListenableCollections.MapResult<U,V>  
ListenableListModel<T> Swing list model (for use by JList) that dynamically reflects the contents of a listenable list.
ListenableSupport<T> Helper class that keeps track of registered CollectionListener instances and eases up the firing of CollectionEvent.
ListenableTableModel<T> Swing table model (for use by JTable) that dynamically reflects the contents of a listenable list.
Pair<U,V>  
SwingCollectionListener<T> Collection listener proxy that forwards in the event dispatch thread all the events it receives.
SynchronizedListenableList<T>  
ToStringAdapter<U>  
ZeroConfListenableMap List of ZeroConf services discovered over the network.
 

Enum Summary
CollectionEvent.EventType
